name: Laser Tower Defense
description:
Made for GMTK game jam 2021, "Joined together".

First 3 levels are tutorials, 4th level is the actual game.
Summary
A tower defense, with the twist, that your towers need energy to fire, you can power up a tower, by directing the beam coming from your base at it.

Towers can power up other turrets, by shooting them, which can result in long links.
This is how the game adheres to the theme "Joined together".

How I see it
I think its a solid idea, but I did not have enough time to polish it...
It's quite broken at the moment.
Had a lot of fun thinking about the possibilities, had a lot of sorrow fixing my randomly corrupted project.
Would do it again. :)
